dcterms:creator: A. Reiss
D. Stricker
dcterms:description: The PAMAP2 dataset is collected using wearable compounded sensors over a group of people aged between 24 and 30 for 10 hours, providing 3,850,505 instances for physical activity recognition.
dcterms:title: PAMAP2 Physical Activity Monitoring Dataset
